ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Highpass Keep
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehehe - what is it about Highkeep that attracts dumb bards?  Back when I was hunting there - I got into a big argument with about Jig and Mana Regen. And this
ygData.messageBody:
Hehehe - what is it about Highkeep that attracts dumb bards? Back when I
was hunting there - I got into a big argument with about Jig and Mana Regen.
And this was RIGHT after GZ posted the note that Jig. I pointed that out to
the guy and he said "Verant's is wrong - I know I tested it"...

Slyde

----- Original Message -----
From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 20, 2000 9:13 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Highpass Keep


> was that he was using a PGT and barbed whip at 30, but hey, sometimes
people
> just like a certain combo. It was when he said "I will sing Hymn and Jig"
I
> thought "uh oh." But I really wanted a group...I died shortly thereafter,
> however the rest of the evening went smoothly. BTW, his name makes it on
the
> silly name list but I think I better not mention it :o)
